name: QuarkWorks
description:
We've been building apps for iOS/Android devices and working on associated server logic the past decade. We’ve worked on dozens of apps being used by millions of people around the world. We know the pitfalls of development and can help you avoid them. Whether you want to ship products faster, scale your team or grow your business, we can help.
Our goal is to work with your company and team to make sure you get exactly what you need. We’ve worked with large companies and enterprise clients as well as tiny startups. 
We help bring your product to mobile users. Smartphone usage continues to explode -- the projected usage for 2019 is 2.5 billion users. Today's consumer expects to be able to do everything from banking to ordering food on their smartphone. Are you missing out on sales, engagement or new customers because you don't have a great iOS/Android app or website?
